Caption: VCON?
Comment: Is Ray hinting that perhaps it's Vicki's turn next year?

Caption: Little and Large
Comment: Brian and Matt meet for the very first time.

Caption: Shiny Happy People
Comment: There are so many happy people at RWDevCon - it's amazing.

Caption: Need More Lanyards
Comment: The moment it all became very real. The conference really was happening!

Caption: Thank You Sponsors
Comment: Without you we wouldn't have been able to put on this amazing conference.

Caption: TUTORIAL TEAM ASSEMBLE!
Comment: The Avengers certainly have nothing on this lot!

Caption: But, But, Delegates
Comment: "Matthijs, stop going on about architecture, we're trying to eat!"

Caption: Lunch
Comment: Mic and Greg grab a quick bite to eat between WatchKit sessions.

Caption: One More Thing...
Comment: The attendees eaglery awaiting the final big announcement.

Caption: Milan Beckoning Marin
Comment: Check out Marin's new catalogue pose!

Caption: Shiver Me Timbers!
Comment: Meet Christine, the world's least terrifying pirate.

Caption: We're Jammin'
Comment: An impromptu ukulele jamming session in the bar with Tim and Tammy.

Caption: Busted!
Comment: That's right Saul, we caught you napping.
